1149490.name: Bokube
1149490.description:
GAMEPLAY

Bokube is a blend of 3D precision platforming, light-combat, movement, and puzzle elements all blended together into a grid based 3D action puzzle platformer adventure.

A scary unknown evil has stolen your fellow kin! Each level has 3 yellow puzzle cube objectives to solve so you can save a fellow Bunny-Cube. As you progress through the adventure the game will throw tons of new kinds of puzzle cubes, enemies and trap hazards at you!

FEATURES

-45 fun levels!

-9 bosses to defeat!

-A cool soundtrack from various Japanese music artists, with a new song in every level.

-Polished 3D audio design to make every level feel atmospheric and satisfy your ears.

-6 zones of the game with 7 levels each that play, look, and feel unique from each other.

-Increasingly challenging difficulty without holding your hand once you're out of the tutorial.

-Beautiful full 3D graphics, with detailed textures, lots of particle effects, and a special "Bevel Cube" art style. 

-Secrets that will keep you up at night!
1149490.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
